Title: The backyard of the house
Text: I reach the back yatd. It looks like a fucking bomb explode in here. This is some fucking family that leaves here ahahah.
I try the back door and it was lock, it must be open only from the inside. But it is a big fucking hole.You could make jumps with the bike.
Lets go back to the front door before something else blows up and kills me. Jesus
